string.value: Drinking the swirling blue liquid within this small iron pot fills the user with an energy that emanates a protective aura. [Gives +100 Overall Defense, +200 Magic Attack for 10 minutes]

string.name: desc
string.value: John Barricade's special concoction, used to get him out of tight jams. For use in emergencies! [Gives +50 Avoidability, +50 Accuracy, +10 Jump for 5 minutes]

string.name: desc
string.value: Weapon attack +20, Magic attack +30 for 15 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A power scream from Maple Admin. Weapon attack +8, Magic attack +12 for 30 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Weapon attack +20, Magic attack +30 for 15 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: This mystical camouflage allows the user to blend into his or her surroundings. [Gives +100 Avoidability for 5 minutes.]

string.name: desc
string.value: A mixture made from an ancient Taru shaman recipe. Instills warriors with the primal strength of the Jungle Spirit. [Gives +35 Weapon Attack, +10 Accuracy for 20 minutes.]

string.name: desc
string.value: Special incense used by ancient Taru shamans for communion rituals with the Jungle Spirit. [Gives +90 Magic Attack for 20 minutes.]

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicious natural beverage made from a secret blend of jungle fruits, flowers, roots, and vines. The perfect thing to fuel a Taru brave through a long jungle trek! [Restores 1000 HP and 2000 MP.]

string.name: desc
string.value: Spread all over the Maple World for the 4th anniversary of MapleStory, this note contains the prizes that you'll win when this is found.

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicious chocolate cupcake with vanilla cream filling. One taste and you'll be hooked! [Restores 300 HP & MP, and gives +30 Accuracy, +30 Speed, and +30 Jump for 3 minutes.]

string.name: desc
string.value: A rare, tasty dessert. Known as the 'Warrior's Dessert' to some and the 'Fattening Treat' to others. [Gives +30 Weapon Attack for 3 minutes.]

string.name: desc
string.value: The fish net seems to have caught something. Let's double-click it to check its content.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: With the purified forest raining gold rain, all affected will receive a temporary boost on speed and jump.

string.name: desc
string.value: An encouraging message from Agent O. Jump rate will be increased by 20 for 30 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: An encouraging message from Agent O. Speed will be increased by 40 for 30 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a cookie shaped like a baby chick. Recovers 1000 HP and MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a potion that you can buy from Sorcerer. It's potent, but its side-effects are equally strong. It's also very expensive, so be careful with it.

string.name: desc

string.value: It's the absolute truth, but it really hurts. It might be better to not know the truth, for what you don't know can't hurt you. Provides WEAPON ATT +10 and MAGIC ATT +8 in your enraged state, but you suffer -50 MP for mental trauma.

string.name: desc
string.value: What you don't know can't hurt you. If the truth is too much to handle, avoiding it may be wise. It provides Critical +10 in your consideration for others, but you suffer -80 HP because of the anxiety that comes after telling a lie.

string.name: desc
string.value: Turns into a random scroll when you break the seal.

string.name: desc
string.value: Turns into a random scroll when you break the seal.

string.name: desc
string.value: What kind of herbs might be in this pouch? There's a small chance that a Vegetable Bag's inside.

string.name: desc
string.value: What kind of minerals might be in this pouch? There's a small chance that a Mineral Bag's inside.

string.name: desc
string.value: This New Year's Gift might contain a blessing. #cDouble click# on it to find out!

string.name: desc
string.value: A cute bunny obtained by raising a Fortune Moon Bunny from an item pot. #cDouble click# to receive a special gift.

string.name: desc
string.value: A gift for Maplers who have piled more than 100 blocks in a week. It must contain something good!\n#cDouble click to open.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A gift for Maplers with no missing days on their Attendance Check. Would could be inside?\n#cDouble click to open.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A gift for getting over 10,000 points in the 2012 Artifact Hunt Contest. Its contents are a mystery.\n#cDouble click to open.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A gift obtained from the Artifact Hunt Contest. Its contents are a mystery.\n#cDouble click to open.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A Herb Pouch dropped by a boss in Monster Park. Who knows what herbs are inside?

string.name: desc
string.value: A Mineral Pouch dropped by a boss in Monster Park. Who knows what minerals are inside?

string.name: desc
string.value: A black box, adorned with gold borders and marked with the seal of the Black Dragon. What could be inside?

string.name: desc
string.value: A box for those who will be remembered as legends.

string.name: desc
string.value: A box specially made for Valentine's Day. Contains a random gift.

string.name: desc
string.value: Returns you to the nearest town.

string.name: desc
string.value: Returns you to the dark Kerning City.

string.name: desc
string.value: Returns you to Sleepywood, a quiet and dark forest-town.

string.name: desc
string.value: Returns you to the dead mine at the higher ground of El Nath.\nCan only be used in Orbis and El Nath.

string.name: desc
string.value: Returns you to the nearest town.

string.name: desc
string.value: A warp capsule that allows the owner of the capsule to warp to the Command Center of Omega Sector.

string.name: desc
string.value: A warp capsule that returns you to Ludibrium.

string.name: desc
string.value: Warp powder made by fairy Phyllia. Teleports you to Magatia when used inside the Nihal desert region.

string.name: desc
string.value: This scroll enables you to return to the Pirate village, Nautilus. This is a one use item and will disappear after use.

string.name: name
string.value: Return to New Leaf City Scroll

string.name: desc
string.value: Use this scroll to venture back to New Leaf City whenever you want!

string.name: desc
string.value: A scroll that the Red Lion King gave to his knights. When used, you will move to the Audience Room of the Red Lion King.

string.name: desc
string.value: A warp capsule that allows the owner of the capsule to warp to the Command Center of Omega Sector.

string.name: desc
string.value: Allows you to move to your spouse's current map. #cDouble click# to use.\nIf your spouse is in a restricted area or you can't teleport from your current location, this stone is unusable.

string.name: desc
string.value: A scroll that teleports you to White Wave Harbor. It will disappear once used.

string.name: desc
string.value: A scroll that returns you to Elluel. It will disappear once used.

string.name: desc
string.value: An enchanted ticket that transports you to the Silent Crusade's Hideout. Crumbles to dust after one use.

string.name: desc
string.value: A ticket that takes you to the Dangerous Cave. Disappears when used.

string.name: desc
string.value: A ticket that takes you to the Subway Ticketing Booth. Disappears when used.

string.name: desc
string.value: A ticket that takes you to the Relic Excavation Camp. Disappears when used.

string.name: desc
string.value: An invitation from the Masked Man to the Halloween Party at the Haunted Mansion. Double-click to move straight to the mansion.

string.name: desc
string.value: An invitation to the studio for the event 'For Guild Only.'

string.name: desc
string.value: An invitation to the moon, sent by the Moon Bunnies. Using this will send you directly to Moon Bunny's ????.

string.name: desc
string.value: An invitation to the baby bird's nest sent by Gaga. Use it to be sent directly to the nest.

string.name: desc
string.value: An invitation to Ereve from Neinheart. This invitation will allow you to instantly move to Ereve.

string.name: desc
string.value: A coupon that allows you to attend the 5th Anniversary Family Photo Shoot Event.

string.name: desc
string.value: A teleport ticket given by the Maple Admin. It will immediately teleport you to Rien.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Special Training Invitation that Ferdi, the Edelstein School Headmaster, gave you. Double-click on it to go to the classroom where the Special Training will be held.

string.name: desc
string.value: A scroll that can teleport to El Nath. Once used, you will directly teleport to El Nath.

string.name: desc
string.value: An unbelievable lamp made by Richie Gold. Use this, and you'll be led somewhere in in the maze. No one knows exactly where you'll be sent, though.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Enhances #cupgraded equipment#.
More successes increase the chance of a good enhancement.
The item is destroyed upon failure.

#c[Enhancement Success Rate]#
1 success: 100%
2 successes: 90%
3 successes: 80%
4 successes: 70%
5 successes: 60%
6 successes: 50%
7 successes: 40%
8 successes: 30%
9 successes: 20%
10+ successes: 10%

string.name: desc
string.value:
Enhances #can equipment item that has been upgraded#.
The higher number of successes, the better chance of applying advanced options.
If failed, the item is destroyed.

#c[Enhancement Success Rate]#
1 success: 80%
2 successes: 70%
3 successes: 60%
4 successes: 50%
5 successes: 40%
6 successes: 30%
7 successes: 20%
8 or more successes: 10%

string.value: A sack filled with Big Puff Daddys

string.name: desc
string.value: A sack that Cassandra gave you as a gift. On it appears a note that reads "Open with Friends."

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons 3 Slimes, Pigs, Orange Mushrooms, Bubblings, Octopuses, Green Mushrooms, and Horny Mushrooms each.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons 3 Drumming Bunnies, Ligators, Ratz, Star Pixie's, Jr. Wraith's, and Jr. Pepe's each.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons 3 Panda Teddy's, King Bloctopuses, Lorangs, Zombie Lupins, Hellies, and Tweeters each.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons 3 Toy Trojans, King Block Golems, Wraiths, Cheif Grey's, and Mixed Golems each.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons 3 Mushmoms, Red Drakes, Ice Drakes, Master Soul Teddy's, and Dark Yeti's each.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons 3 Taurospears, King Blue Goblins, Lucidas, Werewolves, and Yeti & Pepes each.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons 3 Lycanthropes, Death Teddy's, Gigantic Spirit Vikings, and G. Phantom Watches each.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons 5 Bains, 2 Jr. Balrogs, and 1 Crimson Balrog.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons one of each monsters featured in Monster Attack Level 1 ~ Level 3.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons one of each monsters featured in Monster Attack Level 4 ~ Level 7.

string.name: desc
string.value: A marble that contains poisoned monsters. Use it to bring out the poisoned monster from the marble.

string.name: desc
string.value: A marble that contains poisoned monsters on the 1st floor. Use it to bring out the poisoned monster from the marble.

string.name: desc
string.value: A marble that contains poisoned monsters on the 2nd floor. Use it to bring out the poisoned monster from the marble.

string.name: desc
string.value: A marble that contains poisoned monsters on the 3rd floor. Use it to bring out the poisoned monster from the marble.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons a bomb to steel wool from sheep.

string.name: desc
string.value: Plants a Rose Thorn Bush to keep Wolves away.

string.name: desc
string.value: For use in the restricted bonus map area of the subway station.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons Jr. Yeti Pharaoh for the bonus stage of Nett's Pyramid (Easy, Normal, Hard)

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons Jr. Yeti Pharaoh for the bonus stage of Nett's Pyramid (Hell Mode)

string.name: desc
string.value: Small pets love them. Recovers 30 Fullness. NOT for human!

string.name: desc
string.value: A high-quality dry treat that the Pigmies love. Pets love them, too.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click on the item to send a New Year's card to a character of your choice.

string.name: desc
string.value: Can be used on suspected botters. Usable only when a suspect is hunting.

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal piece that resembles Orange Mushroom. When used, the crystal will melt into the body, and its mythical power will transform the user into Orange Mushroom. This mythical power will last for an hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal piece that resembles Ribbon Pig. When used, the crystal will melt into the body, and its mythical power will transform the user into Ribbon Pig. This mythical power will last for an hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal piece that resembles Grey. When used, the crystal will melt into the body, and its mythical power will transform the user into Grey. This mythical power will last for an hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: This potion, given to you by Moira, transforms you into a dragon for a while.

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal piece that resembles Blue Ribbon Pig. When used, the crystal will melt into the body, and its mythical power will transform the user into Blue Ribbon Pig. This mythical power will last for an hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: A potion that can transform you into Tigun the guard.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special shell only found through Mano. Apparently it's powerful enough to grant a wish...

string.name: desc
string.value: First the body feels light, then all of a sudden, you're floating. Oh no, you're a ghost!

string.name: desc
string.value: A ghost-shaped candy with a mysterious set of ingredients. Apparently it has some special powers.

string.name: desc
string.value: An abandoned doll that Sophillia threw away a long time ago, but revived by the Masked Man. Pet its hair, and you'll turn into Sophillia for 3 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: The moment this potion is taken, you'll become a powerful, otherworldly being.

string.name: desc
string.value: The moment this potion is taken, you'll become a powerful, otherworldly being.

string.name: desc
string.value: Transforms you into a small, cute mouse.

string.name: desc
string.value: The mysterious skills of an old halfling has transformed you into a form of a dragon. You can now fly.

string.name: desc
string.value: The more you look at it, the more you feel lightheaded and you feel closer to the moon.

string.name: desc
string.value: A sweet, delicious rice cake. Sometimes creates an interesting set of powers.

string.name: desc
string.value: The moment you drink this potion, you'll become the biggest star in the world of Maple, Gaga.

string.name: desc
string.value: A transformation potion from the masked gentleman that allows you to transform into Peto for 15 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: No one knows what you'll transform into when you drink this, but something WILL happen for one hour. It's all about the risk...

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click on this to transform a character of your choice. Which one? Try it and find out!

string.name: desc
string.value: You've entered a fable and transformed into Geppetto. You're feel a bit sluggish, but do your best to leave the dungeon with your party members.

string.name: desc
string.value: A picture given by Cody of himself. I get a feeling something fun will happen when I use it.

string.name: desc
string.value: A picture of a delicious cake that Cody gave as a gift. I get a feeling something funny with happen when I use it.

string.name: desc
string.value: The mysterious force emanating from the crystal statue shall be absorbed into your body, and you will no longer find yourself as you are.

string.name: desc
string.value: Will transform you into a penguin.

string.name: desc
string.value: Will transform you into a penguin.

string.name: desc
string.value: Will transform you into a penguin.

string.name: desc
string.value: Will transform you into a penguin.

string.name: desc
string.value: Will transform you into a penguin.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: Transforms you into a little Snowman.

string.value: Transforms you into Gustav from Henesys Farm.

string.value: Transforms you into Anna from Henesys Farm.

string.name: desc
string.value: Transforms you into Utah from Henesys Farm.

string.name: desc
string.value: Transforms you into an Blue Mushroom from Henesys.

string.name: desc
string.value: Transforms you into a Pig from Henesys.

string.name: desc
string.value: A potion that can transform you into Surl. For use during your Resistance mission.

string.name: desc
string.value: You've put on the Diving Equipment.

string.name: desc
string.value: You've put on the Mining Equipment.

string.value: A statue that transforms you into a Girl Moon Bunny.

string.value: A potion that can transform you into an Ice Knight.

string.name: desc
string.value: A potion that can transform you into a Jr. Ice Spirit.

string.name: desc
string.value: By using the Halflinger Tamil's secret skill, you were able to transform into a mighty flying dragon for a short period of time.

string.value: Turns the player into the terrifying Jr. Balrog.

string.name: desc
string.value: Contains enough EXP to take a character from level 1 to level 30. If you level up after using it and there's still EXP left in the item, you can use it again. #cDouble-click# to use.

string.name: desc
string.value: Contains enough EXP to take a character from level 30 to level 70. If you level up after using it and there's still EXP left in the item, you can use it again. #cDouble-click# to use.

string.name: desc
string.value: Contains enough EXP to take a character from level 1 to level 30. If you level up after using it and there's still EXP left in the item, you can use it again. #cDouble-click# to use.

string.value: Contains enough EXP to take a character from level 30 to level 70. If you level up after using it and there's still EXP left in the item, you can use it again. #cDouble-click# to use.

string.name: desc
string.value: An EXP elixir that Gaston created. Will it really get you to Lv. 70 in one-go?

string.name: desc
string.value: Engagement Ring made of Moon Rock. The ring will be inside a wrapped box. Required for proposal.

string.name: desc
string.value: Engagement Ring made of Star Rock. The ring will be inside a wrapped box. Required for proposal.

string.name: desc
string.value: Engagement Ring made of gold. The ring will be inside a wrapped box. Required for proposal.

string.name: desc
string.value: Engagement Ring made of silver. The ring will be inside a wrapped box. Required for proposal.

string.name: desc
string.value: An engagement ring crafted out of Moon Rock and Diamond. Use this to propose to your loved one.

string.name: desc
string.value: An engagement ring crafted out of Moon Rock and 2 carats of Diamond. Use this to propose to your loved one.

string.name: desc
string.value: An engagement ring crafted out of Moon Rock and 3 carats of Diamond. Use this to propose to your loved one.

string.name: desc
string.value: Restores tamed monster's fatigue level by 30.

string.name: desc
string.value: Pheremone perfume created by Kenta. Use it to tame a Wild Pig at Korean Folk Town.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pouch with a jewel on the surface. Possesses a special power in that double-clicking the pouch will suck up the surrounding ghosts in the area.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special alchemist tool that converts an absorbed power of monster into a jewel. The inner part seems to be slightly transparent.

string.name: desc
string.value: Cliff's magic cane. Can be used to tame a Lost Rudolph.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's a special magic marble that can contain and purify a monster.

string.name: desc
string.value: The calabash Arec gave you along with the mission. When the King Sage Cat's HP is below 30%, double-click the calabash to seal the King Sage Cat inside.

string.name: desc
string.value: Can be used near aliens to take photos of them.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special magic marble that can contain a poisoned monster on the 3rd floor.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fish net intended to catch something. Can be used with Gaga.

string.name: desc
string.value: A red ribbon that helps catch Maze Pig.

string.name: desc
string.value: A green ribbon that helps catch Maze Pig.

string.name: desc
string.value: A blue ribbon that helps catch Maze Pig.

string.name: desc
string.value: A purple ribbon that helps catch Maze Pig.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: An instant camera that can capture a photo of Hogul.

string.name: desc
string.value: An instant camera that can capture a photo of Growlie.

string.name: desc
string.value: An instant camera that can capture a photo of Tiger.

string.name: desc
string.value: A net that Robinson gave you. You can use it to catch fishes in Aqua Road.

string.name: desc
string.value: A net used for catching a Serpent that has been weakened. Double-click on it to catch a weakend Serpent.

string.name: desc
string.value: A strong cage made of metal. Double-click on it to catch Eleanor's pet after it has been weakened.

string.name: desc
string.value: A rope used for catching a weakened Ribbon Pig. Double-click on it to catch the pig.

string.name: desc
string.value: A sack for capturing weakened Ligators. Double-click to use.

string.name: desc
string.value: An enchanted bottle that can contain the essence of pure light. Double-click on it to capture weakened Spirits of Light.

string.name: desc
string.value: An enchanted pouch that can contain the Giant Nependeath. Double-click on it to capture weakened Giant Nependeath.

string.name: desc
string.value: A glass bottle that contains an actual lava, which is waiting to be spilled out. Drink this lava, and the lava will consume the body with fire, which will enable the drinker to master Fire Demon.

string.name: desc
string.value: A mechanical device that produces black clouds. Enables the character to acquire the Smokescreen skill using the clouds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A stimulant packaged inside a bottle that resembles a clenched fist. Drinking the stimulant will allow the character to acquire Hero's Will.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cThe Owl of Minerva#, which represents wisdom, can be used to search for items sold at the Free Market. #cDisappears right after showing the results of the item search#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Remembers 5 maps of your choice. This rock will enable you to #cteleport to the map you remembered#. It can even allow you to #cmove to the map where a certain character is#, provided that the person is in the same channel at the same world.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Allows you to #cteleport to most other locations through the World Map [W]#. 
Also allows you to #cmove to a map where a specified character is# if they are in the same world and channel. Excluding maps that are restricted from teleporting into, up to #c13# maps can be registered.
#c<Towns that you can teleport to>#
#cHenesys, Ellinia, Perion, Kerning City, Nautilus, Orbis, Ludibrium, Aquarium, Leafre, Mu Lung, Ariant, Edelstein#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons Tommy the traveling merchant. #cDouble-click# to trade with Tommy.

string.name: desc
string.value: When used one at a time, a special power covers my body and blesses me. I think if I collect 20, I'll be able to read what's written inside.

string.value: When used one at a time, a special power covers my body and blesses me. I think if I collect 20, I'll be able to read what's written inside.

string.value: When used one at a time, a special power covers my body and blesses me. I think if I collect 20, I'll be able to read what's written inside.

string.name: desc
string.value: I can receive a reward by answering questions regarding the Cygnus Knights. I should click on it and try.

string.name: desc
string.value: Resets the Gold Key Room in Richie Gold's Maze.

string.name: desc
string.value: Allows you to check your current position, along with the spot of the Gold Key Room.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's full of mysterious scribbles. \n#cA quest will begin when you double-click it.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A compass with no markings. However, it can be turned into a working compass if you have the letters #cN,E, W,S#.

string.name: desc
string.value: A golden compass that reveals the location of Gold Richie's Treasure Island. \n#cBy double-clicking it# you can move to the island.

string.name: desc
string.value: A perfume that contains the scent of an inexperienced adventurer. \n#cBy double-clicking on it#, that scent is released to confuse monsters.

string.name: desc
string.value: An artifact with an unknown date of origin.\n#cDouble-click# on it to find out its date of origin.

string.name: desc
string.value: A frozen popsicle that tranforms you into a Peng Peng. There's no determining the type of Peng Peng you'll transform into.

string.name: desc
string.value: A powerful chemical extracted from a Poison Mushroom. Helps you remove sprawling, thorny magic barriers in the forest.

string.name: desc
string.value: A magic powder that eliminates the thorns from sprawling vines.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chest full of items that's sure to excite anyone who sees it. Open it by June 28th, 2011, or it'll disappear.

string.name: desc
string.value: A box whose contents are unknown, though a Yellow Butterfly might just be hidden inside.

string.name: desc
string.value: A box whose contents are unknown, though a Yellow Butterfly might just be hidden inside. It will be empty if opened by a character higher than Lv. 71.

string.name: desc
string.value: A box whose contents are unknown, though a Yellow Butterfly might just be hidden inside. It will be empty if opened by a character higher than Lv. 101.

string.name: desc
string.value: A box whose contents are unknown, though a Yellow Butterfly might just be hidden inside.

string.name: desc
string.value: A golden compass that will lead you to Gold Richie's Treasure Island. \n#cDouble-click it to# be transported to the Treasure Island.

string.name: desc
string.value: An instant camera that can be used to take a picture of the moon. To take a picture of the moon, double-click on the moon that can be seen from town. If you fail to capture the picture, return to the Moon Bunny for another instant camera.

string.name: desc
string.value: A black bag you received from Hiver, a member of the Black Wings. Release it in front of the Safe...

string.name: desc
string.value: A gift box that Cliff has prepared for the children of Maple World. Double-click to find out what's inside.

string.name: desc
string.value: An item that can be used to reset during an emergency.

string.name: desc
string.value: If you're really curious about how it tastes, muster up your courage and take a sip.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special gift from Dragon Lord. It is highly possible to have a valuable item in the box.

string.name: desc
string.value: One of the treasure notes the Maple Administrator spread among the monsters to celebrate the 6th anniversary. Go see the Maple Administrator if you find a note that has the name of a gift written on it.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fragment from Miracle Cube. Double-click it to use the item. \n Collecting 5 of these fragments will earn you a Potential Scroll, and collecting 10 will earn you an Advanced Potential Scroll.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pass obtained by defeating a monster. You must have the pass to move onto the next stage.

string.name: desc

string.value: A time bomb. Double-click on it and it will explode after a certain amount of time has passed.

string.name: desc
string.value: You can enter the prize event by double-clicking on the sticker. Only Dual Blades can win a lucky NX/Real Life item.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special Energy Capsule for Resistance members. It can only be used by Resistance members Level 30 or above, and may be used up to 7 times. A large amount of EXP will be gained when used.\n#cExpires: Jan 18th#

string.name: desc
string.value: A special Energy Capsule. Starting on Jan 19, it can be used by anyone Level 30 or above, and may be used up to 7 times (Including the number of times the Resistance Energy Capsule is used). A large amount of EXP will be gained when used.\n#cExpires: Feb 28th#

string.name: desc
string.value: A box that contains secret weapons for the Resistance. It is locked with a secret password. It can only be opened by #cResistance members#. It can be used until #cFeb 28th#.

string.name: desc
string.value: A box that contains supplies prepared by Cassandra.

string.name: desc
string.value: A secret box, with something hidden inside. It's locked with a password. It can be opened after #cDecember 20th#. It doesn't seem like it can just be opened by anyone though...

string.name: desc
string.value:
A tasty watermelon obtained from the Tasty Watermelon Pot. Better enjoy it before it goes bad!
#cDouble-click on it to obtain
an Alarm Clock (Right) and one of the following buffs:
-Lv. 30 or below-
ATT/M. ATT +20
Weapon/Magic DEF+200
HP+500
-Lv. 31-70-
ATT/M. ATT +30
Weapon/Magic DEF +300
HP +1000
-Lv. 71 or higher-
ATT/M. ATT +40
Weapon/Magic DEF +400
HP +1500
Buffs can be stacked with other buffs, aside from additional watermelon buffs.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Lump of Christmas snow. To use it, double-click on it or set it as hotkey. Throw it on monsters to attack!

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases success chance of next scroll use by 10%.\n#cCannot be used with potential scrolls or enhancement scrolls.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases success chance of next scroll use by 10%.\n#cCannot be used with potential scrolls or enhancement scrolls.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases the success chance of your next scroll by 10%.\n#cCannot be used with Potential Sccrolls or Enhancement Scrolls.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Using this on a piece of equipment protects it from being destroyed by a failed scroll #c1 time#. Protection disappears after a successful scroll use and it #ccannot be used on items that have been successfully enhanced 12 or more times.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Using this on a piece of equipment protects it from having its #cupgrade count# reduced by a failed scroll #c1 time#. Protection disappears even after a successful scroll use.

string.value: Change your hairstyle to #cEvan Hair# by #cdouble-clicking# this item.

string.name: desc
string.value: A black dragon badge box. Its contents are unknown. \n#cDouble-click on it to check what's inside. However, it can only be opened until TKTKTK until the New Year's event ends.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Spiegelmann's jewelry box containing a random Jewel-Studded Epaulette.\n#cDouble-click to open.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A feather that can upgrade Maple Beryl Equipment to Crimson Maple Equipment with additional potential. You must have 1 empty slot in your Equip Inventory.\r\n#cShoulders cannot gain potential, and previous potential on the Beryl equipment will disappear.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A feather that has 40% chance of upgrading Maple Beryl Equipment to Crimson Maple Equipment with additional potential. You must have 1 empty slot in your Equip Inventory.\r\n#cShoulders cannot gain potential, and previous potential on the Beryl equipment will disappear if successful.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A scroll that turns a weapon into a Soul Weapon, which grows in strength by absorbing the Soul Orbs of enemies.nWeapon Attack (ATT) and Magic Attack (M.ATT) can increase up to 10%, depending on the amount of absorbed Orbs.nCan only be used on Lv

null.name: . 100 or higher weapons that are fully upgraded.nSuccess Rate: 10%

string.name: desc
string.value: A marble containing Balrog's soul.nHas a chance to give a Soul Weapon additional powers, including a skill that draws from Balrog's strength.nSuccess Rate: 25%nFailure may cause the weapon to be destroyed.

string.name: desc
string.value: A marble containing Horntail's soul.nHas a chance to give a Soul Weapon additional powers, including a skill that draws from Horntail's strength.nSuccess Rate: 25%nFailure may cause the weapon to be destroyed.

string.name: desc
string.value: A marble containing Rex's soul.nHas a chance to give a Soul Weapon additional powers, including a skill that draws from Rex's strength.nSuccess Rate: 25%nFailure may cause the weapon to be destroyed.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: Sprinkle some of this dust on Jett's Core to randomly reconfigure its stats. If Jett is at least Lv. 120 and the Core has been completed, this dust also has a chance to randomly increase or decrease stat ranks.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sprinkle some of this dust on Jett's Core to randomly reconfigure its stats. Has a higher chance of granting better stats than regular Star Dust. If Jett is at least Lv. 120 and the Core has been completed, this dust also has a chance to randomly increase or decrease stat ranks.

string.name: desc
string.value: Solidifies the effects of Star or Supernova Dust by locking the Core's current stats for 7 days. Cosmic Dust Solidifier can only be used to lock the current configuration once. \r\n#cWarning: The stat lock will be overwritten if you use an item to reconfigure the Core's stats.#
